title: DIO banned in name change!
body: Why can't you choose a Summoner Name with Dio in it?   {{champion:8}}

replies.body: It looks like that name is currently taken and not available.  Each name is protected by the[ summer name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), but it may become available again if inactive.
